WorkItem.Description:
after executing 
#php sample.php
 
PHP Fatal error:  Uncaught exception 'Exception' with message 'Error outputting PDF to 'file'.' in /home/runman/PDFMerger/PDFMerger.php:124
Stack trace:
#0 /home/runman/PDFMerger/sample.php(9): PDFMerger->merge('file', 'samplepdfs/TEST...')
#1 {main}
  thrown in /home/runman/PDFMerger/PDFMerger.php on line 124
 
TEST2.pdf file after looks ok, but what is with error ?

Comments.Message: The error has to do with the return value for the Output function.  The if statement in the PDFMerger.php file on line 118 is "if($fpdi->Output($outputpath, $mode))", but Output returns '' not a true/false.  I changed the line 118 to read ""if($fpdi->Output($outputpath, $mode) == '')" and it stopped returning the error.
You are the man. Thank you, this saved me some headaches!
